globalHeaders.content-security-policy: default-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' fonts.gstatic.com *.googleapis.com; img-src 'self' data: blob: https:; font-src 'self' fonts.gstatic.com 'unsafe-inline' data:; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' fonts.googleapis.com; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval';
